entry.title: avataar - Enterprise Business Development Representative
entry.content:
This position brings challenges and rewards of being part of the initial SDR team at Avataar. You are required to be multidimensional, but the primary responsibility is to do market research, connect with customers through email\LI\phone, set up meetings, understand their pain points, and suggest solutions, with creative follow-ups leading to sales closure. This position is an integral part of our sales engine and you will work directly with the co-founders to “hunt” for high-value opportunities. This collaboration makes this role unique and one of a kind in the industry. The incumbent is expected to excel in this role and pave his/her own path to becoming a successful Account Executive in the next 18-24 months. BDRs are focused on the front end of the sales cycle and are the face of Avataar. This individual must be a highly motivated, outgoing, self-starter who is able to identify and develop opportunities from multiple sources including prospect lists, and individual research.

What would make you successful in this role?

  • Intellectually Hungry - You never stop learning and asking questions
  • Integrity - You challenge the status quo when you’ve found a better way and you do the right thing no matter what
  • “Get it done” mentality - You are proactive and execute with brilliant focus and a relentless spirit
  • Collaborative - You care about your own career goals, in addition to the success of your team
  • Driven - You challenge yourself to go above and beyond your responsibilities

Job Requirements:

We don't think anyone is the finished article, you should always be looking for ways to develop in your role. So if you don't tick all of these boxes, don't let that put you off, we want to know where you may need some support. However, some hard requirements are:

  • High in TQ(Technology Quotient). Experience with Sales Tech Stack(e.g. Hubspot, Outreach, Salesloft, Zoominfo, Lusha, etc) is desired
  • Proven work experience as an Enterprise Business Development Representative or similar roles
  • Hands-on experience with multiple sales techniques (including cold calls)
  • Familiarity with MS Excel (analyzing spreadsheets and charts)
  • Understanding of sales performance metrics
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Must be organized, detailed and process-oriented
  • Must be a self-starter with the ability to work independently or in a team environment
  • Ability to manage multiple tasks and use good judgment in resolving difficult issues
  • Willing to work in the US time zone(6 pm-3 am)
  • Open to learning best in class sales processes
Apply

entry.title: avataar - 3D Senior Manager - Platform Delivery
entry.content:
Job Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for building, motivating and upskilling the entire Platform Delivery team.
  • Partner with business teams to ensure appropriate resource allocation across all projects.
  • Monitor workload and drive delivery excellence across the Platform Delivery team to provide our global clients with the best in industry outcomes.
  • Proactively anticipate issues with existing workflow, technology and staffing, and present solutions to management with sufficient time for action to be taken.
  • Excellent communication and skills and demonstrated ability to navigate through ‘organized chaos’.
  • Collaborate with HR and business partners to lead hiring, training and performance management.
  • Communicate a consistent and compelling picture of the company’s position as a world-class 3D XR/AR organization to clients and staff.

What’s in it for you?

  • Extremely competitive compensation.
  • Opportunity to lead a fast-growing team of 100+ members today with the potential to grow up to 300+ members.
  • Unparalleled opportunity to build a global business out of India.
  • Owning primary responsibility to scale a critical function.

Job Requirements:

  • 10+ years in Platform Delivery with 5+ years leading a team of artists specializing in all areas of 3D.
  • Strong technical grasp of key 3D principles - modelling, texturing, animation, lighting.
  • Well versed with relevant software including, but not limited to 3Ds Max, Maya, Blender, Z-Brush, Substance Painter, V-ray.
  • A highly organised individual who enjoys the creative process and managing a department/team.
  • Deep understanding of AR/XR industry with global exposure.
Apply

entry.title: avataar - ML Compiler Engineer
entry.content:
Job Responsibilities:

At Avataar Reality labs, we are pushing the boundaries of what is possible in AR/VR and enabling the consumer shift to metaverse at scale. We are building the neural engine to empower the creation, rendering and manipulation of AR/XR content across devices. Our work involves solving challenging problems at the intersection of Computer Vision, Graphics and Deep Learning.

As a ML Compiler Engineer, you will be working on building the framework for optimizing and deploying computer vision models across devices, making best use of modern parallel environments.

  • Proficiency in C/C++
  • Strong programming experience in CUDA or OpenCL.
  • Strong grasp of CPU and GPU performance challenges and optimization techniques.
  • Experience working with at least one deep-learning library (e.g., PyTorch, Jax,TensorFlow, Caffe2). This experience should include optimization of new algorithms.

Preferred Requirements:

  • Experience working with WebAssembly.
  • Experience in shipping computer vision or image processing products to customers
Apply

entry.title: avataar - Manager - 3D Cloth and Simulation
entry.content:
Job Responsibilities:

As a leader of the AI Data team, you will be responsible for the team development, forming robust structures and frameworks for better productivity and leading the team in a way that aligns with the values and vision of the organization. You will also work closely with the R&D team in order to ensure timely and uninterrupted creation of the training datasets. You will be responsible for driving the initiatives and workflow on a day-to-day basis. You will also be responsible for the curation of trendy and aesthetic apparel from internet databases and approval after the team converts those into 3D assets.

What will you do:

  • Lead a team of skilled, energetic and dedicated young people with diverse backgrounds.
  • Work closely with the R&D team and understand their requirements in order to provide them with the training datasets for the development of AI.
  • You will also work in close tandem with other 3D leads in order to understand the functioning of the teams and collaborate towards the product roadmap.
  • Manage, plan and improve the process flow of the team working on the production of the datasets.
  • Understand and identify the best software and workflow for smooth, fast and timely delivery of the datasets.
  • Be responsible for driving the conversion of 2D apparel images into 3D and get those rendered as training datasets.
  • Be responsible for day-to-day activities and productivity of the team.
  • Understand and resolve the efficiency and scalability issues.
  • Research and keep the team updated with the latest trends and developments in the fashion industry, especially related to 3D, AR, XR.

Job Requirements

Are you a dreamer who believes in the endless possibilities of AI and deep learning? Do you want to shape the future of digital commerce? Are you looking to reimagine how consumers interact with brands? Are you looking to board the next rocketship? Then Avataar is your next destination and a once in a lifetime opportunity! Avataar.Me is looking to hire a sharp, personable, highly-organized Team Lead to take ownership of various project deliveries and support the R&D team. This is an opportunity to work with a stellar platform design, product, and engineering team and gain first-hand experience in delivering a product experience. The position will be based in Bangalore and you will be a part of the 3D Platform Delivery team and will report directly to the VP - Platform Delivery.

What we look for:

  • Graduate, preferably from a top-tier design college.
  • Someone with knowledge of apparel CAD and 3D software like Clo3D, Marvellous Designer, Maya, etc.
  • Should have knowledge and understanding of garment patterns and garment construction.
  • Should be well-versed with the jargons and vocabulary used in the fashion industry.
  • Should have at least 2 years prior experience of leading a team of at least 5 people.
Apply

entry.title: avataar - 3D QA Manager - Platform Delivery
entry.content:
Job Responsibilities:

We are seeking a highly motivated, self-directed, enthusiastic, 3D QA Manager to join our team in Bangalore. The ideal candidate would be well-versed in photo realism, with a background in modelling, lighting, UV unwrapping, rendering and who demonstrates photo-realistic asset creation of real-world objects. This position requires intrinsic design abilities, digital expertise, and acute attention to detail. The ability to manage multiple projects, communicate with key stakeholders and collaborate with production artists across nodes is essential. The ideal candidate will be accomplished in working with a variety of 2D and 3D software packages and demonstrate the ability to raise the quality bar in assessing the objects.

  • Determining quality metrics, performing regular analysis of key process indicators in 3D design
  • Develop and execute project-specific QA/QC plans, ensure strict adherence to platform compliance requirements at all times
  • Achieve platform quality operational objectives by identifying opportunities for process improvements and recommending strategic solutions
  • Assess 3D QA associates performance, identify areas of improvement and tailor development plans/activities

Job Requirements

What we are looking for

  • 8+ years of professional experience working in a fast-paced 3D production or 3D QA environment.
  • Minimum 4 years of relevant experience of leading/managing design team(s) in 3D
  • Well versed with design software like Maya, Zbrush, Photoshop and Substance Painter.
  • Adept with technical art production and end-to-end modelling - UV unwrapping, texturing and rendering
  • Proficient in conducting root cause analysis and suggesting corrective and preventive actions
  • Excellent written and verbal communication and presentation skills
  • General Project Management - experience in creating, documenting & refining processes

Preferred Qualifications

  • Demonstrates 3D technical leadership and develops innovative solutions to improve platform quality
  • Build, manage and maintain a high-performance culture among teams of 3D QA leads and 3D QA associates.
  • Strong escalation management experience with multiple stakeholders including business operations and product teams
  • Be accountable for developing and maintaining standard KPIs and delivering SLAs
  • Ability to plan, prioritize and execute in fast-moving delivery sprints
Apply

entry.title: avataar - Director - Customer Delivery & Success
entry.content:
Job Responsibilities:

Customer Advocacy: Act as the advocate for the company

  • Own the customer relationship and positively influence them towards organizational business
  • Maintain high satisfaction levels / NPS scores in their customer accounts.

Seamless Delivery: Ensure quality deliverables as per committed timelines

  • Manage client deliverables while overseeing internal team delivery to meet client expectations.
  • Work with cross-functional teams to define & design exact specs of the customer delivery requirements.

Drive Outcomes: Plan for and achieve RoI metrics

  • Determine key metrics for their customer account to achieve RoI outcomes.
  • Gather feedback on the functionality and user experience from customers and end consumers. and work with concerned teams in partnership with the Product team to make improvements and/or fix bugs.
  • Collaborate with the Engineering, Design, and Product teams at all points of the customer lifecycle to ensure that the delivery meets business outcomes.

Upsell & Cross-sell: Drive expansion of customer contracts

  • Upsell and/or cross-sell platform capabilities to achieve expansion in existing customer accounts.
  • Maintain high renewal rates to ensure recurring revenues from their accounts.

Stakeholder management: Maintain relationships with both internal & external stakeholders

  • Serve as the face of the company with the customers and act as the voice of the customers for the internal teams.
  • Be accountable and communicate with the leadership for all customer account-related actions.
  • Influence key stakeholders across the organization to align intent and prioritization.

Customer onboarding: Educate customers on platform capabilities

  • Work with the Sales team to communicate key features of the platform to the potential customers in order to achieve closure on client acquisition.
  • Partner with the customer teams in the initial stages to ensure a seamless transition onto the platform.

Job Requirements

Qualifications pertinent to this role are:

  • Undergrad degree in computer science, engineering, math, finance, or economics.
  • Master’s degree in business from a top-tier school.
  • 8+ years of relevant customer management or consulting experience in a technology-focused business.
  • Prior experience in managing technical products or online commerce OR Prior experience in a SaaS or consumer technology environment.
  • Prior experiences in customer management/account management of Enterprise scale customers based in the US.

Core skills required for this role are:

  • Be consumer obsessed and come with a customer-first mindset to achieve long term strategic and business goals.
  • Strong relationships building skills; experience managing stakeholders and partners to drive cross-functional programs.
  • Ability to communicate clearly and effectively with different functional groups, developers, business owners, and senior business leaders.
  • Ability to collaborate with and effectively influence remote teams in multiple time zones.
  • Team orientation and willingness to roll up sleeves to solve complex, dynamic challenges.
  • Empathetic with a genuine desire to solve customer’s problems.
  • Entrepreneurial spirit, with a track record for delivering results in fast-moving and demanding environments.
  • History of managing expectations in complex delivery scenarios.
  • Basic level of expertise in domains of customer development, coding, UX, design, and analytics.
